Pure evil.

Now back to this GTA nonsense. My favorite game right now is Fallout New Vegas (meaning favorite game I am currently playing), and in that game I have nuked supply lines, secured an orbital doomsday weapon, irradiated people, betrayed democractic governments, wiped out hostile groups and usurper power.
So maybe my grandfather would like some words with me.

topics.body:
And now for your daily science post:

I was reading up on why the bitcoin is so popular.  The short version explanation is that there's been a market for digital currency for a long time, but there hasn't been any real investments into making a digital currency.

Essentially the reason why the bitcoin is so popular is because people are dumb and don't want to embrace the internet so the people that made the bitcoin saw their chance and took it.
